chapter.title: Using rglclock
chapter.para: rglclock is a rotating 3D clock program using Mesa/OpenGL and GTK+.

sect1.title: Setting Options
sect1.para: Users can set program options using Options dialog.

chapter.title: rglclock Internals
chapter.para: This chapter describes the internals of rglclock.

The internal of rglclock can be divided into several layers:
Clock model
Window component
Application

chapter.title: Loadable Module Interface

note.para: The module interface described in this chapter is not implemented yet. rglclock version 2 will be the first release that implement this interface.

chapter.para: rglclock will have loadable module support for clock models. This will be implemented using libtool.
All structures used for this interface is defined in rglclockmod.h.
